channel.title: Squid Proxy on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Squid Proxy on TLDRBins

item.title: Squid Proxy
item.description: Config location /etc/squid/squid.conf Connect via FoxyProxy Firefox plugin +--------------------------+ | Settings | +--------------------------+ | Title : squid proxy | | Proxy Type : HTTP | | Proxy IP : <TARGET> | | Port : 3128 | | Username : (If any) | | Password : (If any) | +--------------------------+ # Connect http://<TARGET> # Or http://127.0.0.1 Internal ports scan via proxy # 1. Take note of word size, then Ctrl+C wfuzz -z range,1-1000 -p <TARGET>:3128:HTTP -u http://127.
